amendment.description: Strike all after the resolved clause and insert the following: \ Resolved, That the House of Representatives supports an increased awareness among parents, schools, and communities that dating violence is a criminal act and the ideals of the National Teen Dating Violence and Prevention Week.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to the text of the resolution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Issa amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Issa.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Issa amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Issa amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
